wake_up.name: Wake Up
wake_up.description: You awaken in the wasteland. A courier has arrived with an urgent message.

lore.intro: The courier's voice crackles over the radio. 'If you can hear this...'
lore.deep: Fragments of a fractured timeline hint that Vault 77 never told the full story.

quest_vault77_open.name: Open Vault 77
quest_vault77_open.description: A sealed vault riddled with old security systems. Discover how to open it.

lore.hint: Look for a courier who keeps a ledger of delivery codes.
lore.deep: Vault 77's overseer wrote of experiments that broke time itself.

saitama_token_story.name: Saitama Echo
saitama_token_story.description: An enigmatic token rumor echoing through markets and back alleys.
saitama_token_story.notes: In-world legend: a meme token that gained mythic status after a fraud scandal. NPCs mention 'Saitama' as cautionary tale.

saitama_main_arc.name: Saitama Echo: The Fall
saitama_main_arc.description: Investigate the Saitama token collapse and the hidden cabal behind it.

steps.description: Track down Russ, the disgraced dev who vanished.
Trace suspicious wallet flows linked to the token.
Gather evidence and expose the cabal to the public.

lore.intro: Rumors say a small group of insiders siphoned millions during the token launch.
lore.deep: Some members of the so-called community were agents of a larger fraud; their names are whispered in certain taverns.

saitama_side_scammers.name: Scammer's Ledger
saitama_side_scammers.description: Collect testimonies and ledger fragments from victims of the Saitama scam.

objectives.text: Locate a fragment of the scammer ledger
